hero.title: Heritage & Innovation
hero.subtitle: 25 years of excellence in textile research and manufacturing

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in 1998, Green Leaf Textile has grown from a small fabric processing plant to an industry leader. We maintain our commitment to quality first and innovation-driven development, establishing a strong brand image in the global textile industry.
story.content2: Through continuous technological innovation and process improvements, we have evolved into a modern enterprise with a complete industrial chain, with products exported to high-end markets in Europe, America, Japan, and Korea.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide the highest quality textile solutions to global customers through continuous innovation and excellence, leading sustainable industry development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become a leading innovative textile enterprise globally, driving technological innovation and promoting sustainable fashion development.

competence.title: Core Competencies
competence.subtitle: Continuous innovation and pursuit of excellence for superior quality

rd.title: R&D Innovation
rd.desc: Professional R&D team with annual investment exceeding 5% of revenue, driving continuous product innovation

quality.title: Quality Control
